TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ProtectedData extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于加密和解密数据的方法。

span.span: Provides methods for encrypting and decrypting data.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供访问到数据保护 API (DPAPI) 在 Microsoft Windows 2000 和更高版本操作系统中可用。This class provides access to the Data Protection API (DPAPI) available in Microsoft Windows 2000 and later operating systems. 这是一种服务，由操作系统提供，不需要其他库。This is a service that is provided by the operating system and does not require additional libraries. 它提供了使用用户或计算机凭据进行加密或解密数据的保护。It provides protection using the user or machine credentials to encrypt or decrypt data. 类包含两个包装的非托管 DPAPI和。The class consists of two wrappers for the unmanaged DPAPI, and . 这两种方法可以用于加密和解密数据，例如密码、 密钥和连接字符串。These two methods can be used to encrypt and decrypt data such as passwords, keys, and connection strings. 如果在模拟期间使用这些方法，您可能会收到以下错误："该项不适于在指定状态下使用。"If you use these methods during impersonation, you may receive the following error: "Key not valid for use in specified state." 这是因为 DPAPI 在用户配置文件中存储的密钥数据。This occurs because the DPAPI stores the key data in user profiles. 如果未加载配置文件，DPAPI 将无法执行解密。If the profile is not loaded, DPAPI won't be able to perform the decryption. 若要防止出现此错误，加载你想要在调用任何一种方法之前模拟的用户的配置文件。To prevent this error, load the profile of the user you want to impersonate before calling either method. 对模拟使用 DPAPI 会显著增加复杂性，并且要求仔细设计选择。Using DPAPI with impersonation can incur significant complication and requires careful design choices. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用数据保护。The following example shows how to use data protection. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.DataProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.DataProtectionSample/CPP/dataprotectionsample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.DataProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.DataProtectionSample/CS/dataprotectionsample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.DataProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.DataProtectionSample/vb/dataprotectionsample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static byte[] Protect (byte[] userData, byte[] optionalEntropy, System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtectionScope scope);
.method public static hidebysig unsigned int8[] Protect(unsigned int8[] userData, unsigned int8[] optionalEntropy, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtectionScope scope) cil managed
Public Shared Function Protect (userData As Byte(), optionalEntropy As Byte(), scope As DataProtectionScope) As Byte()
public: static cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Protect(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ userData, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ optionalEntropy, System::Security::Cryptography::DataProtectionScope scope);
static member Protect : byte[] * byte[] * System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtectionScope -> byte[]

param.name: userData
param.span: 包含要加密数据的字节数组。

span.span: A byte array that contains data to encrypt.

param.name: optionalEntropy
param.span: 一个用来增加加密复杂度的可选的附加字节数组，或者是 如果不要增加复杂度。

span.span: An optional additional byte array used to increase the complexity of the encryption, or for no additional complexity.

param.name: scope
param.span: 指定加密范围的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the scope of encryption.

summary.span: 在指定的字节数组中加密数据，并返回包含已加密数据的字节数组。

span.span: Encrypts the data in a specified byte array and returns a byte array that contains the encrypted data.

returns.span: 表示已加密数据的字节数组。

span.span: A byte array representing the encrypted data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可以用于加密数据，例如密码、 密钥或连接字符串。This method can be used to encrypt data such as passwords, keys, or connection strings. `optionalEntropy`参数，您可以添加数据，以增加加密复杂度的; 指定`null`不增加复杂度。The `optionalEntropy` parameter enables you to add data to increase the complexity of the encryption; specify `null` for no additional complexity. 如果提供，此信息还必须使用时解密数据使用方法。If provided, this information must also be used when decrypting the data using the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果在模拟期间使用此方法，您可能会收到以下错误："该项不适于在指定状态下使用。"If you use this method during impersonation, you may receive the following error: "Key not valid for use in specified state." 若要防止出现此错误，加载你想要在调用方法之前模拟的用户的配置文件。To prevent this error, load the profile of the user you want to impersonate before calling the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用数据保护。The following example shows how to use data protection. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.DataProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.DataProtectionSample/CPP/dataprotectionsample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.DataProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.DataProtectionSample/CS/dataprotectionsample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.DataProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.DataProtectionSample/vb/dataprotectionsample.vb#1)]

span.span: The parameter is .
The encryption failed.

exception.span: 该操作系统不支持此方法。

span.span: The operating system does not support this method.

exception.span: 加密数据时系统内存不足。

span.span: The system ran out of memory while encrypting the data.

permission.span: 使用关联保护数据的权限的标志。

span.span: with the associated flag for permission to protect data.

MemberSignature.Value: public static byte[] Unprotect (byte[] encryptedData, byte[] optionalEntropy, System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtectionScope scope);
.method public static hidebysig unsigned int8[] Unprotect(unsigned int8[] encryptedData, unsigned int8[] optionalEntropy, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtectionScope scope) cil managed
Public Shared Function Unprotect (encryptedData As Byte(), optionalEntropy As Byte(), scope As DataProtectionScope) As Byte()

public: static cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Unprotect(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ encryptedData, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ optionalEntropy, System::Security::Cryptography::DataProtectionScope scope);
static member Unprotect : byte[] * byte[] * System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtectionScope -> byte[]

param.name: encryptedData
param.span: 一个字节数组，包含用 方法加密的数据。

span.span: A byte array containing data encrypted using the method.

param.name: optionalEntropy
param.span: 用于加密数据，或 的可选的额外的字节数组，如果不使用额外的字节数组。

span.span: An optional additional byte array that was used to encrypt the data, or if the additional byte array was not used.

param.name: scope
param.span: 指定用于加密数据的数据保护范围的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the scope of data protection that was used to encrypt the data.

summary.span: 在指定的字节数组中解密数据，并返回包含已解密数据的字节数组。

span.span: Decrypts the data in a specified byte array and returns a byte array that contains the decrypted data.

returns.span: 表示已解密数据的字节数组。

span.span: A byte array representing the decrypted data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于取消保护使用加密的数据方法。This method can be used to unprotect data that was encrypted using the method. 如果`optionalEntropy`参数是在加密过程中，必须提供解密数据。If the `optionalEntropy` parameter was used during encryption, it must be supplied to unencrypt the data. > [!NOTE] > 如果在模拟期间使用此方法，您可能会收到以下错误："该项不适于在指定状态下使用。"If you use this method during impersonation, you may receive the following error: "Key not valid for use in specified state." 若要防止出现此错误，加载你想要在调用方法之前模拟的用户的配置文件。To prevent this error, load the profile of the user you want to impersonate before calling the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用数据保护。The following code example shows how to use data protection. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.DataProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.DataProtectionSample/CPP/dataprotectionsample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.DataProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.DataProtectionSample/CS/dataprotectionsample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.DataProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.DataProtectionSample/vb/dataprotectionsample.vb#1)]

The decryption failed.

span.span: The operating system does not support this method.

span.span: with the associated flag for permission to unprotect data.
